title: Game extremely laggy
body: So I just downloaded the new patch, and ever since then league games are so laggy they're unplayable for me. I had something like 03 frames in the last game. I play on a mac and have never experienced this issue before.

replies.body: Your PC may need a tune up or there might just be some bad game files reducing your FPS.  Check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure everything is running smoothly.  Be sure to select Mac for troubleshooting steps for your pc.  Hope that helps!
